mapper.select:
SELECT date_format(t.evaluate_time, '%Y-%m-%d') axisX, count(*) axisY FROM ( select
distinct
from product_insight
order by evaluate_time ) t GROUP BY date_format(t.evaluate_time, '%Y-%m-%d') limit 30

SELECT date_format(t.evaluate_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') axisX, count(*) axisY FROM ( select
distinct
from product_insight
order by evaluate_time ) t GROUP BY date_format(t.evaluate_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00')

distinct
from product_insight
order by ${orderByClause}
